title: Short orders
creator_credit: Hal Roach Studios, Hal Roach and Percy Pembroke
brief_description: Stan Laurel stars in this silent film as a harried waiter who must deal with customers who have issues with the quality of the food and service in the restaurant. Various comic situations arise. Cast: Stan Laurel, Marie Mosquini, Eddie Baker, Jack Ackroyd, Mark Jones, George Rowe
creator_credit_for_label: Hal Roach Studios, Hal Roach and Percy Pembroke
